title: Salami
content:
Salami 6 Camp Supplies 1~4 Damage 1d4 Bludgeoning Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A boon to any adventurer - delicious, long-lasting, and hard enough to smack an adversary. Club Light 0.9 10

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A boon to any adventurer - delicious, long-lasting, and hard enough to smack an adversary.

Salami is one of the Club Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable
